Blog.post: Today is a day before my birthday and im EXCITED. Im going partying on Monday AND Sunday. I hope I get good gifts llike a SNOWBOARD!!!!!! I saw my sisters play again today. .. I tried to be nice but she's being a big bitch. I get really pissed of when she takes all of my clothes and brushes but she doesnt let me use anything >:( GOD! she's ANNOYING Mood: Cranky and Excited Song: Roses - outkast

Ok now I can figure out what to write Today was kinda akward cause my aunt came over and had a hangover... very funny I played Barbies with my sister... very not funny And half of my friends cannot come and party with me...Very extremely not funny I shopped today and bought really cool jeans at AE! FUN FUN FUN! We went downtown and got smoothies with an energy boost :) YUM but when I threw it away some creepy looking guy took it out o the garbage and drank it :( EW So anyways..... thats all ~Rachel Mood: Exhausted Song: Barbie Girl - Aqua

Im back from camp OMG It was a blast parties, tearing your ACL, drinking Red Bull again, pushups for being naughty :) Girls I love you.....But I am so totally better than you! Today kinda sucked because............ IDK im soooooo booooored! LALALALALALALALALALALA Nothing to write ~Rachel Mood: Bored Song: Hey Mickey!

Today I got back from camp and Im leaving for Basketball camp in Iowa! Last year was soo much fun! we were riding up an down the elevator, drinking Red Bull and even spying on the counselors having stemy makeouts with boys! HAHA Im so excited cause my cousin's going with me. I rarely ever see her cause she lives in Missouri! Im really bored right now though. Im all packed :) Something that rarely ever happens. CAMP at PHANTOM was a blast! Teddy and I were friends and Swimming Buddy Partners. Now thats a match made in Heaven. Everybody kept laughing at Maddie. She's so perverted. She changes in front of us ON PURPOSE! What kind of pervert does that. Everybody was talking about not wearing a bra and how its so disgusting thatyou can see other people through and Maddie comes down from her bunk and is like I CANT BELIEVE I FORGOT TO PUT MY BRA ON! Ew. and as always she changed in front of us. Anyways. Maddie came up to us and is like "keep in touch" everybody.... you know what that means right? Everyone was so grossed out! All my GIRLS I LOVE YA! AND REMEMBER BECCA STINKS! ~Rachel Mood: Hyper (really hyper) Song: Hey Ya! Outkast

So today i got up really depresssed because I haven't even started packing for camp yet and we're leaving today. I bet you I'm gonna forget everything cause I suck at that kinda stuff! I really hope my friends in my cabin and not have all those creepy people who need special attention ( if ya know what I mean ) So now My mom's yelling at me to get off the computer so I can go pack. She's being a bit of a narcotic right now and its starting to piss me off. So I have to go and finish packing.... You probably won't be hearing from me in awhile :( ~Rachel
